statements: SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Fair' ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Excellent' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM returned_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'good' ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM returned_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY condition ASC;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition LIKE '%fair%' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE item_id > 2 AND condition = 'poor';
SELECT item_id, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'excellent' ORDER BY item_id ASC, condition DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, item_name FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'good';
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_decisions WHERE refurbishment_decision = 'yes';
SELECT item_id, reason FROM refurbishment_decisions WHERE decision_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition='good' ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE id=5
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_decisions WHERE item_id=10 AND refurbishment_decision='approved'
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE id IN (1,3,5)
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_decisions WHERE refurbishment_decision='rejected' ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT * FROM items_condition;
SELECT condition, return_date FROM items_condition;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM items_condition WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, condition, return_date FROM items_condition ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, condition, return_date FROM items_condition WHERE condition = 'New';
SELECT * FROM items_condition ORDER BY item_id ASC, return_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM items_condition WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT i.item_id, i.condition, r.decision FROM items_condition i JOIN refurbishment_decision r ON i.item_id = r.item_id;
SELECT d.item_id, d.decision, dd.disposal_date FROM refurbishment_decision d JOIN disposal_decision dd ON d.item_id = dd.item_id WHERE dd.decision = 'Dispose' ORDER BY dd.disposal_date ASC;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) AS total_refurbished FROM refurbishment_decision GROUP BY item_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems;
SELECT item_id, condition FROM RefurbishedItems ORDER BY refurbishment_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, refurbishment_cost FROM RefurbishedItems WHERE refurbishment_cost > 500;
SELECT item_id, disposal_method FROM DisposedItems WHERE disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, disposal_decision FROM ReturnedItems WHERE disposal_decision IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems WHERE condition = 'Damaged' AND return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, refurbishment_start_date FROM RefurbishmentQueue ORDER BY refurbishment_start_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, refurbishment_cost FROM RefurbishedItems WHERE refurbishment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY refurbishment_cost ASC;
SELECT item_id, disposal_method FROM DisposedItems WHERE reason_for_disposal LIKE '%broken%' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnedItems JOIN RefurbishedItems ON ReturnedItems.item_id = RefurbishedItems.item_id WHERE ReturnedItems.condition = 'Used' AND RefurbishedItems.new_condition = 'Like New';
SELECT * FROM returned_items;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition='Refurbished';
SELECT item_name, disposal_reason FROM disposal_decisions WHERE disposal_reason='Damaged' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT item_id, refurbishment_cost FROM refurbishment_decisions WHERE refurbishment_cost > 500 ORDER BY refurbishment_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_logs WHERE refurbishment_action='Replace parts' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, condition FROM returned_items WHERE condition = 'Poor' AND item_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, MAX(refurbishment_cost) AS max_cost FROM refurbishment_decisions GROUP BY item_name HAVING max_cost > 5000 ORDER BY max_cost DESC;

SELECT returned_items.item_name, refurbishment_logs.refurbishment_action FROM returned_items INNER JOIN refurbishment_logs ON returned_items.item_id = refurbishment_logs.item_id WHERE refurbishment_logs.refurbishment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, disposal_reason, disposal_date FROM disposal_decisions WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-06-01' AND disposal_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
